tool_description:
Extraction of details from image of an Indian Registration Certificate (RC) in real-time.

Fetch vehicle details registered against an RC number
Find the name of the vehicle’s owner
Check class of vehicle
Verify registration date of the vehicle
name: RC Card OCR
title: RC Card OCR

api_list.name: RC Card OCR
api_list.description:
IDfy’s RC Card OCR API enables your customers to autofill vehicle related details in their forms with speed and precision. Just ask for an image of their RC card, and IDfy will digitize the document for you!

When paired with IDfy’s RC Verification API, you can make your onboarding journey seamless, instant, and safe – IDfy will handle both digitisation and verification, enabling you to onboard with confidence and minimise frauds.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rc-card-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_rc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rc-card-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rc-card-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_rc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rc-card-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
